description.value:
Fire, Psychic

Aura 2

Any enemy that starts its turn within the aura takes 10 fire and psychic damage and takes a -2 penalty to Fortitude, Reflex, or Will until the start of its next turn.
Abalach-Re becomes insubstantial and phasing while moving.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ implement

Standard

Attack: Melee 1 or Ranged 10 (one creature)

+27 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 5d8 + 9 damage, and Abalach-Re slides the target 5 squares and the target is immobilized (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ force

Standard

Attack: Melee 3 or Ranged 10 (one creature)

+27 vs. Reflex

Hit: 3d10 + 4 damage, and ongoing 10 force damage (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ implement, psychic

Standard

Attack: Melee 1 or Ranged 10 (one creature)

+27 vs. Will

Hit: 4d10 + 9 psychic damage, and Abalach-Re chooses a minor or a move action that the target must take during its next turn. Abalach-Re cannot make the target use a power.

At-Will

Standard

Effect: Abalach-Re makes three basic attacks. These attacks do not provoke opportunity attacks.

Recharge when first bloodied ✦ necrotic, zone

Standard

Effect: Abalach-Re creates a zone in a close burst 3 that lasts until the end of the encounter. When an enemy takes damage while within the zone, it also takes ongoing 15 necrotic damage (save ends).

Recharge when first bloodied ✦ teleportation

Move

Effect: Abalach-Re teleports 10 squares. She then slides any creature adjacent to her 5 squares.

At-Will

Triggered

Trigger: Abalach-Re is hit by an attack.

Attack (Immediate Reaction): Ranged 10 (the triggering enemy)

+27 vs. Will

Hit: Ongoing 15 damage of the triggering damage type, if any. This attack does not provoke opportunity attacks.

system.biography:
HP 856; Bloodied 428Init +15 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 37Fort 34Ref 36Will 35
Speed 8, fly 5 (hover; altitude limit 2); phasing
Ability ScoresStr 17 (+14)
Con 22 (+17)		Dex 19 (+15)
Int 27 (+19)		Wis 20 (+16)
Cha 24 (+18)
Languages Abyssal, Common, Draconic, Primordial
Alignment Chaotic Evil
Skills Arcana +24, Bluff +23, History +24, Insight +21Senses Low-light vision
Passive Perception 26 | Insight 31

Equipment robes, orb implement .

Traits
